name: Probots
description:
INTRO

Ever feeling lucky?... Well it's your lucky day , meet Plexie (small one) and Proto (big one) , because they will test it for sure. Gameplay gets more and more crazy the further you get , so buckle up!

CONTROLS
  • [WASD] - MOVEMENT
  • [SPACE] - JUMP
  • [LEFT MOUSE] - SHOOT
  • [R] - RELOAD
  • [ESC] - PAUSE / UNPAUSE / GO BACK
GAMEPLAY

Game progresses in waves , with every wave getting harder and harder. You start the wave by picking up the Mystery Box that gives you a random weapon you'll have to use for the wave. 
Current Weapons :

  • Pistol
  • AK47
  • Minigun

Also on new wave you get healed back to full health.
Near the Mystery Box will be 2 platforms that will drop ammo periodically during the wave , ammo is very important in this game.

PROBLEMS
  • Options are only available in menu.
  • Proto (big robot) doesn't have animations.
  • Pistol missing animations due it being the first weapon for testing.
  • Sensetivity / FOV / Sound does not save after you restart the game.
